examples.example: 今天我帮助了一位老人，我为此感到十分开心和自豪。

translate.english: Today I helped an old man, and I feel very happy and proud of this.

examples.example: 看到大家的努力得到了回报，我由衷地感到高兴和欣慰。

translate.english: Seeing that everyone's efforts have been rewarded, I sincerely feel happy and relieved.

examples.example: 每当我帮助他人后，我都会感到内心无比充实和快乐。

translate.english: Whenever I help others, I will feel extremely full and happy in my heart.
